abstract: Shares of the Pfizer animal health spinoff — the biggest initial public offering in the United States since Facebook’s last spring — make an impressive market entrance.
snippet: Shares of the Pfizer animal health spinoff — the biggest initial public offering in the United States since Facebook’s last spring — make an impressive market entrance.

headline.main: Shares of Zoetis Surge on Debut
headline.print_headline: Shares Of Zoetis Climb In Its Initial Offering

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
